overview: An unknown source disseminates a message alerting the world to a disaster that will happen at 4:08 pm. Liaison officer Felix buys a hand-held video camera to document the event. At 4:08 pm, the world goes black. While trying to escape their impending death, Felix and his colleagues run into a portal that takes them to a parallel universe. The film documents the journey of six colleagues as they try to find their way back to reality.
